name: Stellar Showdown 3020!
description:
Dance Monster by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3581-dance-monster
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Cyborg Ninja by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3577-cyborg-ninja
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4

What will game shows be like in the future? Well, maybe people will want to see interstellar junk blown up on live TV, for fun!

Fly around in your well earned spaceship, by using mouse to move and the left mouse button to shoot. Press P to open the upgrades screen and get your ride looking stylish - with more guns, of course!

The game wasn't finished in time, unfortunately - But hopefully I'll come back to it after the jam and actually add an ending this time around.
